overview: In his role as VP of Engineering and Operations at GoldSpot Media, Dave is responsible for the development and delivery of the companyâ€™s mobile advertising solutions and app creation tools, day-to-day operations, and go-to-market planning. An early innovator in the Application Store concept, Dave Roberts has more than ten years of experience developing web services for mobile phones and creating and launching telecommunication products for top-tier businesses around the world. Dave has successfully delivered products to a wide range of sectors across the mobile space, including carriers, consumers, and mobile payments. Previously, Dave was Product Line Manager at Palm Inc., Senior Product Manager at Research in Motion and Senior Engineering Manager at Sun Microsystems. Dave is a graduate of the University of California, San Diego.
